## Introduction document

###Objectives

###Literature

To see the literature packaged for the workshop, run 'browsePapers()' after loading the package:

```{r eval=F}
library(TimberWS1)
browsePapers()
```


###Software

You have already installed this package probably, but here is a reminder on how to do it:
```{r eval=F}
devtools::install_github("stranda/TimberWS1", build_opts = c("--no-resave-data", "--no-manual"))
```

####Installing the main software chain
Please refer to the install_holoSimCell vignette
